short_summary: The Correctional Service of Canada, Quebec Region, requires a Contractor to provide a specified scope of work. Cleaning services are to be provided.
description: The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is looking for a contractor to provide cleaning services at the Regional Services Centre located at 250 Montée St-François, Laval, Quebec H7C 1S5. The objective of this project is to provide a specification of cleaning services, which imposes asset requirements that ensure that the required cleaning service standards are met. The contractor is required to provide a safe and healthy environment for employees and the public.
duration_in_months: She Services to be performed from May 1st, 2023, to March 31st, 2024, with the option to renew for one (1) additional one-year period. Total duration estimated at 12 months, excluding renewal periods.

Cleaning Services
================

### Service Information

*   Title: Cleaning Services
*   Reference Number: cb-4220-69669180
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Solicitation Number: 21301-24-4331036

### Publication and Closing Dates

*   Publication Date: 2023-03-15
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-05T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2023-04-05

### Contract Details

*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-01
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31
*   Contract Status: Expired

### Procurement Information

*   Procurement Category: SRV
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Description and Contractor Requirements

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is inviting service providers to participate in an open bid for the provision of cleaning services at the Regional Services Centre in Laval, Quebec. The Contractor must provide labor, with CSC providing cleaning products and equipment.

**Objectives:**

*   The Contractor must provide cleaning services for the areas and at the frequency indicated in Annex A - Statement of Work.
*   CSC will provide cleaning equipment available to the Contractor.

**Deliverables:**

*   The Contractor must deliver cleaning services for the areas and at the frequency indicated in Annex A - Statement of Work.

**Security Requirements:**

*   This standing offer includes security requirements.

**Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:**

*   This procurement is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement.

**Classification:**

*   UNSPSC 76111500: General building and office cleaning and maintenance services

### Bidding Information

*   Bidders may submit their bids electronically.
*   Bids must be submitted in either English or French.
*   Bidders can request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

### Contact Information

*   Contact Name: Adriana Salvatore
*   Contact Email: [Adriana.Salvatore@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:Adriana.Salvatore@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Related Documents

The complete solicitation document, including the statement of work and evaluation criteria, can be downloaded from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
